### Tender Description

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is inviting qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of a SYNC SERVER S650 for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police. The goods and services code for this procurement is MASS STORAGE SUBSYSTEMS - VERY LARGE.

 Please submit your proposals according to the instructions provided in the attached documentation. The procurement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

 Your prompt response is appreciated, and we look forward to reviewing your proposal.

 Kind regards, [Shared Services Canada]
